ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Special Request: Plane of Mischief
ygData.msgSnippet: Current theory I ve heard is that the Mirror that requires a key on the 7th Floor of the Tower of the Frozen Shadow leads to PoM.  Right now, one of the key
ygData.messageBody:
Current theory I've heard is that the Mirror that requires a key on the 7th
Floor of the Tower of the Frozen Shadow leads to PoM. Right now, one of the
key NPCs in the quest for the key is turned off on Xegony. Spawns with a !.
The quest I know of goes thru Kael, so I'm hoping that the key will take the
whole party like all the other mirrors in the Tower. Or, maybe there's more
than one quest for those of us who chose to ruin Giant faction. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol




> Will do bug, but as of yet the entrance hasn't been found. A guy at work
is
> in FoH and they only have a rough guess of what zone it *may* be in.
>
> -=B=-
> The Rathe
